Metadata.Title: CVE-2026-24882 affecting package gnupg2 for versions less than 2.4.9-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2026-24882 affecting package gnupg2 for versions less than 2.4.9-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package gnupg2 is earlier than 2.4.9-2, affected by CVE-2026-24882
